game_description: Welcome to Playbook - an immersive experience revolutionizing how teams prepare for competition. Remove tedious play and drill memorization from practice and allow players to take the initiative and study on their own. Create plays through our Web Application (vreps.us), and watch them through the app in 3D. Experience plays from the perspective of any player on the court, or roam freely to explore the play from any angle. Interact with your plays in a whole new way, and move from X’s and O’s to a new virtual way to prepare.
